tasix
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Sardor Muminov

Overview
--------

Tas-IX package

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install tasix


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/muminoff/tasix.git
    $ python setup.py install
